These simple construction elements can help you make flyers and diagrams for your network. If you're on a computer, you can copy and paste the elements into your workspace. The elements also work fine with scissors and glue.

MATERIALS + SUPPLIES NEEDED

Paper

Scissors

Glue stick

Computer (optional)

Graphic Design, presentation, or drawing software (optional)

Graphics

Download a complete collection of graphic elements you can use in your flyers and diagrams (as a PDF).

Related Information

MODULES

If you wish, use this module to complete "Get the Word Out: Flyer Design" and "Design your Network: Every Network Tells a Story"

External Resources

If you want to make a diagram with these Elements on a computer, you can find free, open source graphic design programs available online. Look for Inkscape for drawing diagrams and Gimp for working with photos. Google Docs also has a free drawing tool.

thenounproject.com has a graphics that you can use along with these Elements.
